document_title: Left testicular pain: Causes, symptoms and prevention
subsection_content:
Left testicular pain associated with dangerous conditions such as testicular torsion requires immediate medical attention. Below are some serious symptoms that men should note so they can contact their doctor early: (4)
The pain appears suddenly and intensely; Inability to locate both testicles.; Symptoms of pain or swelling appear one hour after the injury.; Pain accompanied by nausea or vomiting; Pain and fever.; The scrotum is painful, red, and feels warm; Feeling unusual lumps, lumps or worm-like tufts in the scrotum; Having difficulty urinating, feeling the need to urinate but not being able to urinate.; Presence of blood or abnormal waste in the urine.; Pain symptoms become more and more severe.
subsection_title: dau tinh hoan ben trai.json. When to see a doctor?
subsection_data:
dau tinh hoan ben trai.json. When to see a doctor?
Left testicular pain associated with dangerous conditions such as testicular torsion requires immediate medical attention. Below are some serious symptoms that men should note so they can contact their doctor early: (4)
The pain appears suddenly and intensely; Inability to locate both testicles.; Symptoms of pain or swelling appear one hour after the injury.; Pain accompanied by nausea or vomiting; Pain and fever.; The scrotum is painful, red, and feels warm; Feeling unusual lumps, lumps or worm-like tufts in the scrotum; Having difficulty urinating, feeling the need to urinate but not being able to urinate.; Presence of blood or abnormal waste in the urine.; Pain symptoms become more and more severe.
